measure.name: expose_chillers
measure.description: This measure idenifies all chillers in the model and exports all related data.
measure.modeler_description: The measure performs the following functions: (1) ID's all chillers, (2) Locates their performance curves and outputs the data, (3) Adds reporting variables for chiller-related data.

argument.name: space_name
argument.description: This name will be used as the name of the new space.
